attributes.action: Require all MPs to have an E Mail Address
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many MPs do not have E Mail addresses nor websites even though funds have been made available for this purpose. This is not conducive to maintaining a dialogue with the electorate nor in the interests of democracy. As public funded servants they should be compelled to use modern communication links.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
